ygData.subject: Re: [EQ-Monks] Everquest Secrets?
ygData.msgSnippet: A friend of mine actually paid for the password, against my advise. There is nothing there that can t be found on any other EQ sites. There is less information
ygData.messageBody:
A friend of mine actually paid for the password, against my advise. There
is nothing there that can't be found on any other EQ sites. There is less
information than most EQ sites have, and 80% of it is out of date
from patches. There are no "secrets" there. Just go to allahkazam's site.

This is just an advertizing scam, he posts to all the newgroups now and
then.



On Fri, 13 Oct 2000, Andy Sands wrote:

> At 13:28 12/10/00 -0700, you wrote:
> >Because I think he is trying to find out who is giving away his
> >secrets...lol
>
> Can someone here hack his website and post the password up?
>
> I bet his secrets are pants anyway (and against the AUP)
>
> --
> Herrick of Quellious [Reign of Fate]
> 26th Circle
> Saryrn
